messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode22
doc/devel/weekly.html:22: The rune type is now an alias for int32.
didn't struct equality go in too?

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode25
doc/devel/weekly.html:25: http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go1.html#rune
file not found: /tmp/adg/godoc/go-doc/doc/go1.html

i assume it will arrive once you're synced but the /tmp/adg is odd...

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode28
doc/devel/weekly.html:28: "code.google.com/p/repo/path"
s/repo/repositoryname/
or maybe even use a real example

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode29
doc/devel/weekly.html:29: It will reject imports in the old style, like "repo.googlecode.com/hg/path".
s/like //

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode31
doc/devel/weekly.html:31: Use goinstall -fix to automatically update broken packages.
s/ automatically/

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode34
doc/devel/weekly.html:34: The -tabintent flag has been renamed to -tabs.
s/to //

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode59
doc/devel/weekly.html:59: * exp/ssh: Wait() returns an *ExitError (thanks Gustav Paul).
s/\(\)//

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode63
doc/devel/weekly.html:63: implement == on structs and arrays,
yes

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode66
doc/devel/weekly.html:66: many bug fixes (thanks Lucio De Re and Rémy Oudomph.
that's not his name

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode102
doc/devel/weekly.html:102: values of underlying type uintptr can be converted to unsafe.Pointer,
i can't parse this list. more newlines

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode22
doc/devel/weekly.html:22: The rune type is now an alias for int32.
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> didn't struct equality go in too?

Yes, added.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode25
doc/devel/weekly.html:25: http://weekly.golang.org/doc/go1.html#rune
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> file not found: /tmp/adg/godoc/go-doc/doc/go1.html
> 
> i assume it will arrive once you're synced but the /tmp/adg is odd...

It will. That's error's not good.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode28
doc/devel/weekly.html:28: "code.google.com/p/repo/path"
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> s/repo/repositoryname/
> or maybe even use a real example

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode29
doc/devel/weekly.html:29: It will reject imports in the old style, like "repo.googlecode.com/hg/path".
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> s/like //

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode31
doc/devel/weekly.html:31: Use goinstall -fix to automatically update broken packages.
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> s/ automatically/

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode34
doc/devel/weekly.html:34: The -tabintent flag has been renamed to -tabs.
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> s/to //

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode59
doc/devel/weekly.html:59: * exp/ssh: Wait() returns an *ExitError (thanks Gustav Paul).
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> s/\(\)//

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode66
doc/devel/weekly.html:66: many bug fixes (thanks Lucio De Re and Rémy Oudomph.
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> that's not his name

Done.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2001/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode102
doc/devel/weekly.html:102: values of underlying type uintptr can be converted to unsafe.Pointer,
On 2011/12/15 05:00:01, r wrote:
> i can't parse this list. more newlines

A lot of them are redundant now that I mention struct equality in the notes.

LGTM but mention rune constants

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2002/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045/diff/2002/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode27
doc/devel/weekly.html:27: The rune type is now an alias for int32.
and character literals have the default type of rune.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=82fdc445f2ff ***

weekly.2011-12-14

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5494045

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
